resources.string: Long coat Tokyo made of 90% wool. The product has a deflated armhole and two side pockets

Wool straight coat with cuts on the sleeves. The coat is made of 90% wool, which is ideal for basic demiseason wardrobe (some of our customers wear them all winter with a warm sweater) combined with shoes or sneakers.

Wool coat with oversized-silhouette, as if of "a man's shoulder." Model with dropped armholes and two patch pockets fastens with three metal buttons. Ideal for basic demiseason wardrobe (some of our customers wear them all winter with a warm sweater) combined with shoes or sneakers.

Wool coat with oversized-silhouette, as if of "a man's shoulder." Model with dropped armholes and two patch pockets fastens with three metal buttons. Ideal for basic demiseason wardrobe (some of our customers wear them all winter with a warm sweater) combined with shoes or sneakers.

Denim Jacket, perhaps, must-have of the coming season. Comfortable to wear, stylish and versatile denim jacket will create a variety of styles. The jacket can be worn with jeans, dresses and culottes.
